    @allure.feature("个人中心")
    @allure.story("完整测试流程")
    def test_personal_center_workflow(self):
        """测试个人中心完整流程"""
        try:
            # 初始化页面对象
            self.base_page = BasePage(self.driver)
            self.login_page = LoginPage(self.driver)
    
            # 执行登录并等待
            logger.info("开始执行登录...")
            login_success = self.login_page.login("wxdfg", "wxd341134@")
    
            if not login_success:
                raise Exception("登录失败")
    
            # 等待页面完全加载
            time.sleep(3)
    
            # 验证用户菜单是否存在
            try:
                user_menu = WebDriverWait(self.driver, 15).until(
                    EC.presence_of_element_located(
                        (By.XPATH, "//span[@class='ant-dropdown-link user-dropdown-menu ant-dropdown-trigger']"))
                )
                logger.info("找到用户菜单元素")
            except TimeoutException:
                logger.error("未能找到用户菜单元素")
                allure.attach(self.driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), "用户菜单未找到", allure.attachment_type.PNG)
                raise
    
            # 点击用户菜单
            self.click_user_menu()
    
            # 继续执行其他操作
            logger.info("开始执行报表统计...")
            self.do_report_statistics()
    
            logger.info("开始执行字体下载...")
            self.do_font_download()
    
            logger.info("开始执行密码修改...")
            self.do_change_password()
    
            logger.info("开始验证新密码...")
            self.do_verify_new_password()
    
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"个人中心测试流程失败: {str(e)}")
